Blogs.title: The Machinist
Blogs.content: Very well made thriller starring christian bale with excellent performances, cult classic. 4.5 stars, please watch for sure

Blogs.title: leo messi
Blogs.content: the greatest of all time, carries both his teams on shoulders, fantastic in all the roles of striker, playmaker, dribbler.
